Uses of Package
org.restlet

Packages that use org.restlet
org.restlet Top-level classes, interfaces and exceptions. 
org.restlet.component Units of software instructions and internal state. 
org.restlet.connector Mechanisms that enable communication between components. 
org.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector. 
 

Classes in org.restlet used by org.restlet
AbstractRestlet
          Abstract restlet that can be easily subclassed.
Chainlet
          Chainer of calls to a target restlet.
Factory
          Factory implemented by Restlet API implementations.
Maplet
          Mapper of calls to other restlets.
Resource
          Intended conceptual target of a hypertext reference.
Restlet
          Handler of calls to resources or sets of resources.
RestletCall
          Represents a call to be handled by restlets.
RestletException
          Generic exception used in the Restlet framework.
UniformCall
          Represents a call handled via the uniform interface.
UniformCallWrapper
          Uniform call wrapper.
